subject: Steroids
lead_paragraph: The motion to disqualify Roger Clemens’s lead lawyer, Rusty Hardin, said Hardin had a conflict of interest because he had represented Andy Pettitte and Clemens.
snippet: The motion to disqualify Roger Clemens’s lead lawyer, Rusty Hardin, said Hardin had a conflict of interest because he had represented Andy Pettitte and Clemens.
